title: 611: REAL REASON TO BELIEVE BITCOIN WILL HIT $10 MILLION BY THIS DATE!! BTC HYBER-BULLISH ASCENSION!!
description:
While a $10 million Bitcoin price might seem hyper-bullish, there is real reason to believe such an ascension in BTC price could occur. Bitcoin will experience three halvings this decade. Historically, in the year following each halving, the bitcoin price shoots up exponentially due to an increase in demand and decrease in supply in the market.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
